document_data.name: Conyberry Stout
document_data.mainbody: '''Conyberry Stout''' was a type of alcohol brewed and exported out of the village of [[Conyberry]] on the edge of the [[Neverwinter Wood]].
document_data.Description: The infamous local dark [[stout]] was terrible, by all accords, but an extremely potent intoxicant.
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Conyberry Stout was one of the few things the village was famous, or infamous in this case, for.
